titles.title: To extend funding for the Corporation for Travel Promotion under the Travel Promotion Act of 2009.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Manufacturing, and Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/8/2013--Introduced. Amends the Travel Promotion Act of 2009 to extend permanently the funding for the Corporation for Travel Promotion. (Under current law, such funding terminates at the end of FY2015.)
